title: 3 and Out - Vikings Harbaugh Mistake, Brady's Pats Grudge, Brian Flores Bribe Allegations, Bears HC/GM Head Scratchers, Hurry Up Headlines
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Vikings Harbaugh Mistake, Brady's Pats Grudge, Brian Flores Bribe Allegations, Bears HC/GM Head Scratchers, Hurry Up Headlines
description:
John explains why the Vikings made a big mistake by not hiring Jim Harbaugh, and why Tom Brady won't let go of his grudge against the Patriots. He also discusses Brian Flores' bombshell lawsuit, why not tanking cost the Dolphins Joe Burrow, and why sham interviews - unfortunately - are nothing new in the NFL. Also, why he has major questions about the Bears GM/Coach hires, and other top headlines, including the new meh Washington Commanders branding, the decline of former OC wunderkind Joe Brady, and how this year's pre-draft process will be different from the past two.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
